hero.name: Klibi Ahmed
hero.title: Front End Developer & UI/UX Designer
hero.description: Computer Science Student at ISIMA | UI/UX Designer | Building innovative solutions with modern technologies

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Computer Science Student | Front End Developer | Graphic Designer
about.journey1: I'm a Computer Science student at ISMA (Institut Supérieur d'Informatique) in Mahdia, Tunisia. As a Front End Developer and Graphic Designer, I specialize in creating innovative web and mobile applications with a strong focus on UI/UX design and user experience.
about.journey2: Active member of the Microsoft ISMA Club, I participate in hackathons and contribute to building a collaborative tech community. I'm passionate about problem-solving, teamwork, and continuous learning.
about.journey3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me playing football or exploring new technologies and design trends.
about.cleanCodeDesc: Writing maintainable, scalable, and efficient code following best practices.
about.modernDesignDesc: Creating beautiful, intuitive interfaces with attention to detail and UX.
about.fastPerformanceDesc: Optimizing applications for speed and delivering exceptional user experiences.

skills.title: My
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with to bring ideas to life

education.title: Education &
education.subtitle: My academic journey and language proficiency
education.description1: Computer Science degree with focus on software development, algorithms, and modern web technologies.
education.description2: High school diploma in Computer Science with strong foundation in programming and mathematics.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work showcasing my skills and creativity
projects.project1Title: Goutina Mobile App - HackMingle DSC Hackathon
projects.project1Desc: Mobile application developed for Goutina, a cake company. Created during the HackMingle Developer Student Club hackathon. Features include product catalog, ordering system, and intuitive user interface for cake selection and purchase.
projects.project2Title: No More Slavery (NMS) Platform - ISMA Hackathon
projects.project2Desc: Complete UI/UX design and user experience for the No More Slavery platform. Created intuitive interface with modern design, including welcome page, donations, news feed, chat, and partner organizations management.
projects.project3Desc: Full-stack online event reservation platform. Led team as Scrum Master (5 sprints) for development. Implemented REST APIs, reservation logic, real-time conflict management, and admin dashboard with role validation.
projects.project4Desc: Full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) web application built with PHP and MySQL. Features include user management, data validation, responsive design with Bootstrap, and secure database operations.
projects.project5Desc: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with React.js, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Features bilingual support (English/French), animated UI with Framer Motion, project showcase with image galleries, contact form with EmailJS integration, and dark theme with red accents.

testimonials.title: What People
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from clients and friends I've worked with
testimonials.person1Text: Ahmed is an exceptional developer with great attention to detail. His work on our project exceeded our expectations.
testimonials.person2Text: Working with Ahmed has been a pleasure. He's creative, professional, and always delivers high-quality work.
testimonials.person3Text: Ahmed's technical skills and communication made our collaboration smooth and successful. Highly recommended!
